text: 49|17|geudeul-i museullim doem-i geudaee ge eunhyeleul bepun geos-eulo saeng-gaghana illeogalodoe neohuiga museullim doem-i na-ege eunhyedoen geos-ila saeng-gagji mal la hananimkkeseo neohuiege eunhyeleul bepusa neohuileul mid-eum-eulo indohasyeoss nani neohuineun jinsildoego seongsilhaeya hanila
